channel.title: How do I add Buy X Feature and make shop items noted?
channel.description: Well I have some shops but I haven't figured out how to make a buy X feature for the items I've put into a shop and make the items it sells noted... If someone could tell me what file to edit and what code I would use it would be GREATLY appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: How do I add Buy X Feature and make shop items noted?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Check the stickied packet documentation, for buy 10, 5, X, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add Buy X Feature and make shop items noted?
